title: riot point give away, scam or not?
body:
I mean links like these being sent to you ingame through friends lists. 

**[_Scam link removed - Wuks_] **

replies.body: Scam. If Riot ever gave away RP, it'd be announced in the actual client.

> [{quoted}](name=Third Reich,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ddoEBVEz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-16T08:25:24.503+0000)
>
> Scam. If Riot ever gave away RP, it'd be announced in the actual client.

Yup! Anything that Riot is hosting would be on lolesports.com, leagueoflegends.com, or riotgames.com (and sometimes external websites like woobox, which will be linked from an official announcement or page).

Going off the sticky post i'd say it is, i didn't log in or anything, since i only login on my laptop my info is saved and didnt see the need to login again, however you may want to add a compiled list of known sites which are scams also, going through the links it gives (it is harmless fyi, just don't try to login with your LoL account) it may confuse alot of people, and on the links which are harmless, like going to boards etc as far as i can tell it takes you back to the legitimate sites (Doing so does mean you can only go back to the RP offer via the back option on your browser)
